db:abstract.db:para: Enables basic Bluetooth operations like scanning for devices and connecting them.
This module was introduced in Qt 5.2.

This module was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:listitem.db:para: The QBluetooth namespace provides classes and functions related to Bluetooth.
The QBluetoothAddress class assigns an address to the Bluetooth device.
The QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent class discovers the Bluetooth devices nearby.
The QBluetoothDeviceInfo class stores information about the Bluetooth device.
The QBluetoothHostInfo class encapsulates the details of a local QBluetooth device.
The QBluetoothLocalDevice class enables access to the local Bluetooth device.
The QBluetoothServer class uses the RFCOMM or L2cap protocol to communicate with a Bluetooth device.
The QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent class enables you to query for Bluetooth services.
The QBluetoothServiceInfo class enables access to the attributes of a Bluetooth service.
The Alternative class stores attributes of a Bluetooth Data Element Alternative.
The Sequence class stores attributes of a Bluetooth Data Element Sequence.
The QBluetoothSocket class enables connection to a Bluetooth device running a bluetooth server.
The QBluetoothTransferManager class transfers data to another device using Object Push Profile (OPP).
The QBluetoothTransferReply class stores the response for a data transfer request.
The QBluetoothTransferRequest class stores information about a data transfer request.
The QBluetoothUuid class generates a UUID for each Bluetooth service.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Qt Bluetooth C++ API enables an application to scan for devices and connect and interact with them in a more flexible way than the Qt Bluetooth QML Types.
